mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, other_1, other_2, password, port, server_id, start_sh, status, status_sh, stop_sh, type, username, version from sys_software where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_software( id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, other_1, other_2, password, port, server_id, start_sh, status, status_sh, stop_sh, type, username, version) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{other1}, #{other2}, #{password}, #{port}, #{serverId}, #{startSh}, #{status}, #{statusSh}, #{stopSh}, #{type}, #{username}, #{version})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_software where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
